Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.orchestration.scenario

Class ScenarioOrchestrationContext<M>

java.lang.Object
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.orchestration.scenario.ScenarioOrchestrationContext<M>
Type Parameters:
M - The response model type of the orchestrated scenario
public class ScenarioOrchestrationContext<M> extends Object
Context used during the orchestration of an integration-scenario.

Holds the original request from the provider that initiated the orchestration, as well as a list of responses received from the consumers called during the orchestration.

It also supports storing an aggregated response for the integration-call, which can be created during the orchestration-run by integrating consumer-responses via setAggregatedResponse(Object, Optional).

    • getResponse

      public Optional<M> getResponse()
      Returns the current response payload following this logic:
      • If getAggregatedResponse() contains a response, it is returned
      • Otherwise the resposne from the latest step is returned using getResponseForLatestStep()
      Returns:
      Current response
